metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2953 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in extractImageSection in tools/tiffcrop.c:6905, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 48d6ece8.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff-tools - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff6 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiffxx6 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1').
